name: Teddy Bear Makeover Pro - A Animal Makeup & Dress-up Game
name_original: Teddy Bear Makeover Pro - A Animal Makeup & Dress-up Game
description:
Get ready to Make and Dress-up your Teddy Bear and make it the World's most beautiful, cute and Amazing Teddy Bear. ADS FREE VERSION.

You've got HUGE selection of shoes, shirts, dresses, pants, accessories, jewelry and more for your Teddy Bear.

-Wash your Teddy Bear and make it up with Amazing tools.
-Dress up your Teddy Bear with Amazing accessories.
-Hundreds of Teddy Bear Combinations!
-Fun for Kids and even Adults!
-Great sounds for Teddy Bear Dress-up.

Share Your Amazing Teddy Bear with your Friends and other world through Facebook, Twitter, Email etc.

Enjoy this most fun game and share your feedback as we will really appreciate your words and will create more cool games for you.

Download today!
